name: Tiny Army Battle Run
description:
Test your skills shooting while running. This is dangerous territory! Collect coins while running along the terrain. Choose from several characters and several worlds. This is your mission. You decide. Imagine running for your life while listening to cool music and dodging or shooting obstacles. Exciting fun and challenging.

HOW TO PLAY:

Press the lower left of screen to jump. Hold down press to jump higher. Press the lower right to shoot. Collect coins to unlock new planes and worlds.

-Amazing Graphics
-Cool Sounds
-Exciting Planes

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!

EXCITING FUN!!

Download ‘Tiny Army Battle Run’ now and save the universe!!!
